meta.title: Mochi Trapped in Glitter Invisible Box

beats.visual: Spotlight snaps on; Mochi pats the air, hits unseen wall.
beats.gag_note: Sound effect of gentle glass ping.

beats.visual: Mochi traces box outline; sparkles mark imaginary edges.
Invisible elevator lever lowers Mochi dramatically.
Mochi pulls invisible rope; imaginary anvil hovers overhead.
Invisible door opens; Mochi smacks into side panel.
Mochi climbs invisible ladder, floating higher with each paw.
Box suddenly shrinks; Mochi's whiskers squish comically.
Invisible confetti rains as Mochi escapes with flourish.
Mochi runs into new wall, shrugs to camera.

tts_line: Mochi keeps finding walls that only exist in mime-land.
style_prompt: cartoon chubby white cat, plush texture hints, clean bold outlines, flat pastel colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, spotlit stage with invisible box mimed by cartoon cat, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
